channel.title: Dodian 7.0 item+object problem
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've been trying to get this thing working, and its running up errors almost constantly.. managed to sort them all out, but when i add item on object, it throws up three errors, none if which i know how to correct :S Tbh im new at coding, but i think im getting the hang of it, but my god im confused with this..
this is what i added: [code]else if(useItemID == 989 && atObjectID == 172)//TREAT REWARD { deleteItem(6966, getItemSlot(6966), 1); addItem(4153, 1); sendMessage("You use the key on the chest, and a sweet reward!");[/code] I dont think theres anything wrong with that atm, its for crystal key use on crystal chest - gives item 4153, which i think is cut dragonstone..
It seems to be problem with the "(useItem" and "atObjectID".. The "u" and the "a" are where the arrows are pointing to, telling me the errors are with them, but idk really..
As i said, im new to this, so i'l need some pointing as to which code needs to be changed, to what :p
Any hints, or tips, or even criticism is gladly taken lol :]

item.title: Dodian 7.0 item+object problem
item.dc:creator: @Niceneasypk Niceneasypk
item.description:
@Niceneasypk wrote:

Reply, dw its not completely off this topic as it is to do with objects
But Still looking for help please someone, Its not a newly added object, it was added before so it’s not due to that ;\ So should be item.cfg…
Still… il copy out the errors i get, see if that gets any more help :rolleyes:
Thanks for offering help though guys

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian 7.0 item+object problem
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

if u just added the object to ur server then tried to make it work with an item you have to add the object into object.cfg before its considered in the serer otherwise its just taking up space in ur server i found that out affter i couldn’t use an object that i added in my devolution 7.0 base,

if this is a little off the topic ur getting at sorry i didn’t read the replys other ppl gave

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @shiniy shiniy
item.description:
@shiniy wrote:

well here is something i am trying to do add dodian objects to make it easy t train but wen i get it right the objects dont apear and idk how to edit wen the npcs give xp i try to look evry were but i cant find it so if any one welp?

item.title: Dodian 7.0 item+object problem
item.dc:creator: @Niceneasypk Niceneasypk
item.description:
@Niceneasypk wrote:

Cause idk where to apply it to, and more to the point, “do the command”… what command.? i got a code here with problems with two bits… im looking essentially for another way to say this in a dodian based server. Nothing More. Now he tells me to “::oadd click object twice ::odump ::oadd”… That means nothing to me :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian 7.0 item+object problem
item.dc:creator: @Niceneasypk Niceneasypk
item.description:
@Niceneasypk wrote:

Dude, this isnt a competition to see who can use the least number of words to help a noob out…

To be quite honest, i dont know where the f*ck that goes… if its in game, or if its my code, or what command even? cause the command to get there works fine… just this server in particular doesnt want to accept the code that all the other servers do…

Please try and make it easier than that too. Sorry but thats no-use atm. I get what im doing, but where, how? bit more detail pls anybody? :o

Read full topic
